title: Permaculture garden startup in the Morvan France. Inspiring couple with love for the earth.

tasks.task: Participate in permaculture project at a castle
subtasks: Assist with digging trenches for polytunnel
Apply plastic foil to metal frame of polytunnel
Prepare garden beds and plant young plants
Use a multifunctional tool for digging and back scratching

tasks.task: Teach and host courses at the castle
subtasks: Prepare sewing machine equipment and setup
Plan to host courses and experiments in gardening

tasks.task: Engage in community living and mutual inspiration
subtasks: Work with a group towards common goals
Support each other's unique qualities and expertise
Share content and encourage donations for the project
